summary:
Hi there, thank you for stopping by :)

If you're here, then I'll just introduce myself! My name is Hoang Anh, a 24-year old Communication graduate at the HAN University of Applied Sciences in the Netherlands. Coming from Vietnam, I appreciate the opportunity to study in an international environment and gaining many different experiences working in international firms. 

I decided to pursue Marketing-communication as my profession during my high school years. I thought the experience of managing a high-school club, organizing events and working with sponsors were quite fun, and somewhat coincide with what we do in Marketing-Communication. So, I chose my major and went with it. My experiences in the Netherlands had lead me to follow the path of digital marketing. Through my times working as both intern and junior marketer, I have learned about various aspects of digital marketing such as:

• Social media and search advertising
• SEO and content marketing
• Marketing automation
• Campaign management
• Data analytics and Data-Driven Marketing 
• A bit of Growth Hacking


I particularly like data analytics and how we can use data to better help us in marketing activities. I think E-commerce can also be something I would like to get into. But for now and the upcoming years, I want to grow into a well-rounded digital marketer who knows his stuff! With the orientation visa approval, I can finally come back to the Netherlands and look for new challenges there. 

You're still reading this? Wow, thank you for your time! Please feel free to hit the connect button, we just might collaborate some days :)

treasury_media.title: Digital Magazine for Velo-Ctiy, in the making
treasury_media.description:
This is one of the project that i engaged in during my second year at Arnhem Business School. As a team, my and my teammates were assigned to make a digital magazine for Velo-City, an annual conference on cycling. 
Due to the project running internally, we did not publish the magazine, but the material would be use by our client. This is a screenshot of our digital magazine in the making with the website "Instant Magazine".

treasury_media.title: Meet the people of Arnhem&Nijmegen
treasury_media.description:
One of the videos i along with my team produced for our project-winning digital magazine for Velo-city, a conference on cycling.
To be frank I am not really satisfied with my work, but due to limited resources ( financial, time and human resources ) we managed to finish our task and contribute to our group's winning the project.

treasury_media.title: Draw Velo City
treasury_media.description: One of the videos I along with my team made for our digital magazine project for Velo-City 2017, a cycling conference taking place in June in the Arnhem-Nijmegen region ( The Netherlands )

school.name: Foreign Language Specialized School ( High School )

projects.title: PR Plan for Zembro Personal Alarm
projects.description:
One of my school projects that involves real clients looking for advices. 
Zembro is a start-up company in personal alarm for active senior citizen. Our task was to make a PR plan ( and learn the neccessary knowledge  ) for Zembro with the aim increasing awareness for the company

projects.title: Digital Magazine - Velo-City 2017
projects.description:
One of the projects with real-clients from Arnhem Business School. Our client was Velo-City 2017, a cycling conference taking place in Arnhem-Nijmegen, The Netherlands. We were assigned to make ( as well as prepared the necessary knowledege ) to make a digital magazine to promote the conference for our lovely clients. Our group was the winner of the project as we were able to meet the client's requirement while adding our own creativity to the project.
The magazine we created was not published , but instead the materials and ideas we provided were used by our client to make their own version.  Here you can find one of the videos i in charge of making , and i did include a screen shot of our magazine in the making the media section of my profile

projects.title: CNN Idol 2014- Andromayda
projects.description:
This is one of my biggest project i engaged in during my high school time. Me and my team organized our school's talent show that lasted for 3 months and ended with a final prom night, of which profit was dedicated to a charity project.
I was the head organizer and my tasks were to:
 •	Acquired sponsors
•	Managed and maintained relationships with sponsors
•	Managed human resource
•	Supervised ongoing tasks  
•	Making the planning of the projects

profile_positions.description:
I wanted to give it a try in content writing to improve my writing skill, so I joined Havina Global Group as a content-marketer. At Havina, I am involved in:
- Creating informative social media content for Havina Global and Havina Language Academy 
- Creating SEO-friendly content for Havina Global website and Havina Language Academy website
profile_positions.title: Content Marketer

profile_positions.description:
Having acquired experience and knowledge in digital marketing through my previous internships, I took on the Junior Digital Marketer role at iCheck. I was responsible for digital activities such as:
- Managing, web-caring, monitoring and reporting of our websites 
- Running lead generation campaigns using Facebook ad, Google Search and GDN
- Designing/Creating Landing pages together with support from the design team
- Diversifying our digital marketing tactics and activities: E-mail marketing, downloadable content
- Preparing for iCheck's Lunar new year gamification campaign (Cross-function working, Game design, UX design, Digital Ad preparation, Livestreaming preparation,...)
- Working closely with Insider's Mobile and Web-suite
profile_positions.title: Junior Digital Marketer

profile_positions.description:
After my first internship, I decided that I want to purse digital marketing and expand my knowledge and experience in the field.

As the digital marketing intern for the Global Ice Cream team, I was responsible for

- Coming up with personalization ideas for websites, implementing A/B tests and reporting (Mostly with Magnum brand)
- Web-caring and some QA for Walls and Magnum website
- Online monitoring and reporting using several analytical tools
- Creating and managing internal sharepoint sites for cross-countries collaboration
- Assist the digital marketing team as well as brand managers in day-to-day tasks 
- Assist in e-commerce brand guideline creation project
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Intern@Global Ice Cream Digital Team

profile_positions.description:
For my first internship. I appreciate the opportunity to become a part of a global firm and to work in a very diverse and people-focused environment.

As part of the digital marketing team handling corporate functions, I got to:
- Learn about data analytics by using Google Analytics and Hotjar 
- Learn about the how-to of content marketing with Accenture Insight website
- Conduct a research assignment on the importance of color for brand visual identity and give advices based on the results
- Initiate, idealize and produce a video project for employer's branding purpose
- Manage Accenture NL social media
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Intern@Corporate Function

profile_positions.description:
Our group - Impel had the chance to work with a real-life client: Velo-city cycling conference. 
Velo-city is an annual cycling conference taking place in a different country every year. In 2017, the conference was held in Arnhem - Nijmegen. We had the task of creating a digital magazine to promote for the conference. Our team worked together to identify our "brand", content, copy-writing, style and we all had our own roles. After the foudation for the magazine was completed, i took on the role of media director and produced 2 videos as well as various photos/pictures. You can find some of our work on the media page of my linkedin profile.
profile_positions.title: Media Director

profile_positions.description: Being the team leader, or head organizer of prom Andromayda of Foreign Language Specialized School; I had the responsibility to lead a team of 30 people to successfully organized a prom for charity. My biggest  responsibility, however, was to acquire sponsorships and maintain good communication with our sponsors as well as online newspaper which deliver news regarding the prom.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader + Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
My event-organizing skills came from my time at CNN English Club, where us management board had the responsibility of organizing from simple club meetings, field trip, to a 1-long-month film making projects. I also was assigned to manage the club's relationship with several sponsors.
I enjoyed my time at the club, and the experience at the club was so exciting that it motivated me to choose a profession/career with elements of communication and creativity.
profile_positions.title: Management Board + Account Manager
